s.text: Although bereft of up-to-date display cases and featuring explanations written in Chinese only, this museum provides the most exhaustive overview of Chinese civilizationÊÑÊillustrated with national treasuresÊÑÊof any gallery in China.
There are artists at work in its studios, and recent works can be purchased in the gift shop.
There are artists at work in its studios, and recent works can be purchased in the gift shop.
Like the Ming Tombs, the Eastern Qing Tombs are entered via a long Sacred Way, lined with 18 pairs of stone animals and court officials.
